name: cssobj-plugin-cssom
description: Generate and patch style sheet into CSSOM for cssobj-core

scripts.report: cd dist && gzip < cssobj-plugin-cssom.min.js > cssobj-plugin-cssom.min.gz && ls -lh && rm -f *.gz
scripts.build: git rev-parse HEAD > .commithash && rollup -c && uglifyjs dist/cssobj-plugin-cssom.iife.js -cm -o dist/cssobj-plugin-cssom.min.js

author: James Yang <jamesyang999@gmail.com>
